ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Federal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Regulations, 2007
PrecisRegulations Amending the FEDERAL-PROVINCIAL FISCAL ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, 2007 in order to ensure that, despite the recent reclassification by Statistics Canada of Ontario Electricity Financial Corporationâ€™s debt retirement charges, the determination of Equalization and Territorial Formula Financing payments continues to be made in a manner consistent with the policy intent underlying the 2008 and 2013 amendments, which would also ensure consistent treatment of electrical financing companies.
